answers.answer: I'm due December 25th :) it's my first so I'm very excited!

I'm due Dec 25 with my first as well! How is everyone feeling? Has anyone had an ultrasound yet?

I'm due December 23rd. We are very excited for our Christmas baby

xmas day.but my 3rd baby.i have 10yr old and 4 yr old now.congrats december mommas
Due December 25th. My first ultrasound is scheduled on the 20th of this month.

I'm ten weeks along and due December 8th. This is my first baby at almost 33 yrs old. My husband and I are so excited. Had a sonogram done yesterday and I was able to see our toots. Such a beauty. I have a few complications with gestational diabetes and high blood pressure, and a fibroid that's growing along with the baby. I'm praying all will be fine and the baby will be born healthy.

I'm due Dec 9 and Dr told me they would deliver 1 week early since this is my going to be my 3rd baby and I require to have c-sections... so now my expected arrival is Dec. 4.  I've had 2 ultrasounds already and get another one in 4 weeks.  I'm now 10 weeks along.
Due December 24th, but I was a few days early with my first and wouldn't be surprised if the same happens with this one. First U/S is the 26th when I'll be 9w5d!

question: Hi so I'm a ftm I'm not due until December 24th Yes Christmas Eve I know how exciting. Any other expecting December mommy's
title: December FTM!!!! Anyone Else?
